 2021-05992021-06-1792019,  ,  ,  ,  PS
ActAn Act to amend certain Acts and Regulations in relation to Firearms
SubjectOrder Fixing July 7, 2021 as the Day on Which Section 2, Subsection 4(3) and Sections 6, 8 and 15 of that Act Come into Force
PrecisOrder fixing July 7, 2021 as the day on which certain provisions of AN ACT TO AMEND CERTAIN ACTS AND REGULATIONS IN RELATION TO FIREARMS (Bill C-71) related to enhanced background checks and safeguards related to the transportation of restricted prohibited firearms, COME INTO FORCE.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2021-0035 Publication Date: 2021-07-07
AttachmentsAttachment
